00049 template <typename TAGTYPE>
00050 class TaggedBuffer : public Buffer {
00051  private:
00052   TAGTYPE tag;
00053  public:
00054   TaggedBuffer() : Buffer(), tag(TAGTYPE()) {}
00055   TaggedBuffer(TAGTYPE t) : Buffer(), tag(t) {}
00056   TaggedBuffer(TAGTYPE t, const char *data, size_t size) : Buffer(data,size), tag(t)  {}
00057   TaggedBuffer(const TaggedBuffer<TAGTYPE> &rhs) : Buffer(rhs), tag(rhs.tag) {}
00058   TaggedBuffer(TAGTYPE t, const Buffer &rhs) : Buffer(rhs), tag(t) {}
00059   virtual ~TaggedBuffer() {}
00060   virtual const TaggedBuffer<TAGTYPE> & operator = (const TaggedBuffer<TAGTYPE> &rhs) {
00061     tag=rhs.tag;
00062     Buffer::operator=(rhs);
00063     return *this;
00064   }
00065 
00066   virtual TAGTYPE GetTag() const { return tag;}
00067 
00068   virtual void Serialize(const int fd) const {
00069     writeall(fd,(char*)&tag,sizeof(tag));
00070     Buffer::Serialize(fd);
00071   }
00072   virtual void Unserialize(const int fd) {
00073     readall(fd,(char*)&tag,sizeof(tag));
00074     Buffer::Unserialize(fd);
00075   }
00076 
00077   virtual std::ostream & Print(std::ostream &os) const {
00078     os << "TaggedBuffer(tag=" << tag << ", ";
00079     return Buffer::Print(os);
00080   }
00081 
00082   friend std::ostream &operator<<(std::ostream &os, const TaggedBuffer& L) {
00083     return L.Print(os);
00084   }
00085 };
